actions.name: Serrated Beak
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 6 (2d4+1) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 CON save or be restrained as it begins to turn to stone. The creature must repeat the save at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrified for 24 hours.

special_abilities.name: Monstrosity Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The cockatrice is resistant to exhaustion and to the frightened condition.
